subject: Suspensions, Dismissals and Resignations
Football
College Athletics
Football (College)
lead_paragraph: Mike Dyer, Auburn’s all-Southeastern Conference tailback, was suspended for violating undisclosed team rules and will not play in the Chick-fil-A Bowl on Dec. 31 against Virginia.
snippet: Mike Dyer, Auburn’s all-Southeastern Conference tailback, was suspended for violating undisclosed team rules and will not play in the Chick-fil-A Bowl on Dec. 31 against Virginia.
